snippet: John Daly has rubbished the formation of a task force to examine ways of improving the dire recent run of the U.S. Ryder Cup team, urging his country to appoint Tiger Woods or Phil Mickelson as player-captain....

headline.print_headline: Daly Wants Woods or Mickelson as Ryder Cup Player-Captain
headline.main: Daly Wants Woods or Mickelson as Ryder Cup Player-Captain

lead_paragraph: John Daly has rubbished the formation of a task force to examine ways of improving the dire recent run of the U.S. Ryder Cup team, urging his country to appoint Tiger Woods or Phil Mickelson as player-captain.
